author: m.kalinin
content: A question about custody game. Validator that has correctly computed custody bit may not store the block it's been attesting to. Would it be considered as honest behaviour? If not, what incentives validator has to behave the other way?

author: protolambda
content: Custody challenges are currently missing from the spec, refactored out to hastily after the devcon changes. But expect another version of that back, and then being able to call out those who are not holding their data
